Module ingsw.codex_naturalis
Package ingsw.codex_naturalis.server

Class GameControllerImpl

java.lang.Object
ingsw.codex_naturalis.server.GameControllerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameController, Remote
public class GameControllerImpl extends Object implements GameController
This class is the controller of a specific game.

      jsonDrawCardEvent - card to draw
